name: Rift Swine
description: The Rift Swine is a large aberration characterized by its chaotic nature and unpredictable mutations. It has a bulky physique suited for physical combat.
memorable: Its ability to mutate at the beginning of each turn creates a dynamic and unpredictable combat experience.
goals: The Rift Swine acts on its whims, embodying chaos rather than adhering to a specific goal or objective.
relations: Related to other chaotic creatures or aberrations that embody unpredictability.
environment: Found in areas of chaos, often within corrupted lands or places where reality is unstable.
strengths: High resilience due to robust hit points and natural armor, enhanced by advantageous perception from its many eyes.
weaknesses: Notable weaknesses in social interactions due to low Intelligence and Charisma.
attacks: Can unleash devastating Tusk and Tentacle attacks, grappling enemies, or utilize Warping Bolt for ranged force damage.
most_powerful_ability: Chaos Mutations allow it to change its combat capabilities every turn, making encounters unpredictable.
senses: Gains advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks tied to sight, enhancing its ability to detect threats.
additional_information: Can grapple Medium or smaller creatures with tentacle attacks.
Warping Bolt can impose disadvantage on attack rolls.
Possesses inherent force and poison damage resistance.
Has two tentacles for crowd control tactics.
Utilizes a unique mechanic that varies its combat role each turn.
